Level 31
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level 31
By Y.K. TAN on Saturday, May 29, 2004 - 11:16 pm:

Stage 31

At the start of the stage, you would be standing on a ledge. The are actually only three things to note in this stage.

Those red octopus thingy, jokers and your speed in creating/destroying boxes. Firstly, make boxes towards the right and quickly race up to the right. Destroy the box where the red octopus might land and make enough box so that the joker won't destroy the box you are standing on. Rinse and repeat until you got yourself all the way to the key. As the movement of the lower joker's space is getting limited, make sure you create another line of boxes at the top of the second jokes, and when the timing is right. Jump right into the door, and you win!
